mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ijaz Family Cemetery, Indian Valley Dist.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This well maintained cemetery shares a fenced and divided enclosure with the Duncan Cemetery. It is located next to the driveway for 1298 White Rock Rd. NW. It is visible using Google Earth. N 36 57.152' W 80 29.728'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
